Pre-Game Insights: Adam Mazur to start for Miami. Mazur in eight starts has an ERA of 7.49 with WHIP of 1.81 with the Padres. The righthander strikes out 13.9% with 13.3% walks. Ground balls are 33.6% with 1.60 home runs per nine innings.
Bailey Falter to start for Pittsburgh. Falter has 24 starts with an ERA of 4.45 with WHIP of 1.31. The lefthander fans 16.7% with 7.1% walks. Grounders are 34.6% with 1.11 home runs per nine innings.
Mazur in Triple A this year has an ERA of 6.53 with WHIP of 1.33 getting hurt with home runs. Falter in his past five starts has an ERA of 6.85 with WHIP of 1.82.
Miami is batting .226 against left-handed starters losing 40 of 50 with a -27.8-unit loss. The Pirates have won seven straight against the Marlins.
